title: Looking to buy a Galaxy Z Fold 3? Samsung US is offering $100 in store credits and accepting cracked screen trade-ins today
content:
The Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 3 is one of the best foldables out there, even so far in 2022. While other foldables have come along that better serve different sets of use cases, the Galaxy Z Fold 3 remains a premier choice thanks to its wide availability and improved durability over its predecessor. The post Looking to buy a Galaxy Z Fold 3? Samsung US is offering $100 in store credits and accepting cracked screen trade-ins today appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Samsung is offering a lot of incentives on the Galaxy Z Fold 3, including store credits, enhanced trade-ins for cracked screens, and more!
